message:
SA,
I've been noticing some delays in streaming videos/browsing for the last couple of days, but when I do the speed test (that chooses the nearest server based on your location by default) it shows me high speed download rates.
Today I performed the test by choosing a server outside Egypt manually, and found this catastrophic result.

My bundle is 10Mbps, and my ISP is Etisalat.
1. Do you experience such delays with other ISPs?
2. Do you think this is the local ISP problem, or it's a regional/global ISP issue?

Thanks in advance.

data.message: Yea sometimes..  Changing between dns servers helps a bit

i get the same results approximately when I choose any server outside Egypt even if it's near (Israelian ISP) for example.

not sure why is it throttled that much...

ISP: TeData
Check this group for deep packet inspection.

There is something wrong with the ISPs these days..
My speed throttles sometimes while playing online 
and other time it goes above my subscribed plan ..
Ups & Downs
